about_the_game:
Pressure Within - A Unique Zombie Survival Adventure with a Twist

In a world overrun by zombies, fear takes on an unusual form. It's not the undead that terrify, but a question we've all been too afraid to ask: When is it safe to answer nature's call?

Prepare to embark on a nightmarish journey where the clock is your worst enemy, and the last working lavatory is your sanctuary. To survive, you'll need to gather ammo, arm yourself with weaponry, and manage your...um, "bowel pressure."

Key Features:

No Hand-Holding: There are no checkpoints here. Your fate rests solely in your hands. Survive, or start over.

Diverse Game Modes: Challenge yourself with tougher foes, unravel a linear story in "The Runs," or engage in frantic battles in the BETA multiplayer mode.

Ongoing Development: Dedicated to enhancing the experience with new game modes, increased difficulties, and innovative weaponry.

Pressure Within offers a unique blend of zombies, humor, and survival, and it's all crafted by a passionate solo developer. Get ready for a gaming experience like no other, where entertaining you and giving you a few laughs are top priorities.

Are you brave enough to tackle the undead and your own inner demons? Enter the world of Pressure Within and find out.

name: Pressure Within

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 6GB
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Survive a post-apocalyptic nightmare in this third-person shooter. The apocalypse is horrifying, but one question remains: Where's the bathroom? Battle zombies and solve terrible riddles to reclaim your world.
